content: mosaic knitting is my favourite technique - it looks complicated but is actually so simple to do you only work with one colour at a time and the only stitches are knits purls and slipped stitches i designed this sock pattern with the circuit symbol for a capacitor in mind however when i showed it to some friends all they could see was the letter i choose two yarns with high contrast and all i s will be on you as you rock your electrifying new socks there are 4 sizes s m l xl with 56 64 72 80 stitches per round the sock is worked cuff-down with a heel flap instructions are written and the mosaic pattern is both written and charted you may use any technique/needles you prefer for knitting a tube in the round you are free to sell anything you make using this pattern but please do not sell the pattern itself or otherwise claim it as your own
